law.history: Repealed 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 296, sec. 19, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 222, sec. 4. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 403, sec. 9. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 376, sec. 4. -- Created 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 206, sec. 4.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Regulations for races -- License required -- Revocation of license.
